member.name: O:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Header Status
member.summary: This enum has the Status of the BCPT Header.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Header Status.
member.summary: Specifies the initial state.

member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Header state is Running.

member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Header state is Completed.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Header Status.Cancelled
member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Header state is Cancelled.

member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Line Delay Type Fixed.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Line Delay Type.Random
member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Line Delay Type is Random.

member.name: F:Table::System#Tooling#BCPT Log Entry.Orig# Status
member.summary: Contains the original status of the test if any event subscribers modifies the status of the test

member.name: F:Table::System#Tooling#BCPT Log Entry.Orig# Message[250]
member.summary: Contains the original message of the test if any event subscribers modifies the message of the test

member.name: F:Table::System#Tooling#BCPT Log Entry.Log was Modified
member.summary: Is true if any event subscribers has modified the log entry

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Role Wrapper.SetBCPTLine(BCPT Line@)
member.summary: Sets the BCPT Line so that the test codeunits can retrieve.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Role Wrapper.GetBCPTLine(BCPT Line@)
member.summary: Gets the BCPT Line stored through the SetBCPTLine method.

member.name: O:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Run Type
member.summary: This enum has the Run Type of the BCPT Header.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Run Type.BCPT
member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Header Run Type is BCPT.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Tooling#BCPT Run Type.PRT
member.summary: Specifies that the BCPT Header Run Type is PRT.

member.name: O:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context
member.summary: Exposes functions that can be used by the BCPT tests.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.StartScenario(Text)
member.summary: This method starts the scope of a test session where the performance numbers are collected.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.EndScenario(Text)
member.summary: This method ends the scope of a test session where the performance numbers are collected.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.EndScenario(Text,Boolean)
member.summary: This method ends the scope of a test session where the performance numbers are collected.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.UserWait
member.summary: This method simulates a users delay between operations. This method is called by the BCPT test to represent a realistic scenario. The calculation of the length of the wait is done usign the parameters defined on the BCPT suite.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.GetBCPTLine(BCPT Line@)
member.summary: Returns the BCPTLine associated with the sessions.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.GetBCPTHeader(BCPT Header@)
member.summary: Returns the BCPTHeader associated with the sessions.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.GetParameters:Text
member.summary: Returns the paramater list associated with the sessions.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Context.GetParameter(Text):Text
member.summary: Returns the requested paramater value associated with the session.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Tooling#BCPT Test Suite.OnBeforeBCPTLineAddLogEntry(Code[10],Integer,Text,Text,Boolean,Text,Text@,Boolean@,Text@)
member.summary: This event is raised before a log entry is added to the BCPT Line table. It can be used to skip errors which are not relevant for the test suite. Like unused handler functions.
member.param: The id of the test codunit that is being run
Description of the test on the "BCPT Line"
Original operation that is currently executed
Replacement operation that is currently executed
